line_1: Food fills the wame, an' keeps us livin;
line_2: Tho' life's a gift no worth receivin,

line_1: Food fills the wame, an' keeps us livin;
line_2: When heavy-dragg'd wi' pine an' grievin;

line_1: Food fills the wame, an' keeps us livin;
line_2: The wheels o' life gae down-hill, scrievin,

line_1: He cheats us of our living.
None had envy'd me when living;
